channel.title: sendMessage to players within X distance? [PI]
channel.description:
Well, this one is rather obvious on what I need. I want a message to be broAdcast (I know how to implement it into what ever I choose) to players within a certain distance of the player that created the broadcast. So for instance, say I wanted a command "localyell" What it would do is send a yell to all players in (lets say) 15 meters (1 walk spot on rs = 1 meter). How would I accomplish this?
I feel like emulating yell would be the way to go.
